parse.title: List of alternative names for oceans

text.*:
This article has multiple issues. Please help improve it or discuss these issues on the talk page. (Learn how and when to remove these template messages)
This article does not cite any sources. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (August 2013) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
This article may be confusing or unclear to readers. In particular, Consider alternative format for ease of reading. Please help us clarify the article. There might be a discussion about this on the talk page. (August 2013) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
(Learn how and when to remove this template message)

The world's oceans have different names in different languages. This article attempts to give all known different names for the five oceans.

English name Other names or former names
Arctic La'ôt Arktik (Acehnese), Arktiese Oseaan (Afrikaans), Arktischer Ozean (Alemannic), አርክቲክ ውቅያኖስ (Amharic), Īshæf (Anglo-Saxon), المحيط المتجمد الشمالي (Arabic), Ocián Glacial Arctico (Aragonese), Հյուսիսային Սառուցյալ օվկիանոս (Armenian), উত্তৰ মহাসাগৰ (Assamese), Océanu Glacial Árticu (Asturian), Şimal Buzlu okeanı (Azerbaijani), Ozeano Artikoa (Basque), Паўночны Ледавіты акіян (Belarusian), উত্তর মহাসাগর (Bengali), Arktički okean (Bosnian), Meurvor skornek Arktika (Breton), Северен ледовит океан (Bulgarian), အာတိတ် သမုဒ္ဒရာ (Burmese), Oceà Àrtic (Catalan), Kadagatang Artiko (Cebuano), Kadagatan Arktiko (Central Bicolano), 北冰洋 (Chinese), Çурçĕр Пăрлă океанĕ (Chuvash), Arktik okean (Crimean Tatar), Arktički ocean (Croatian), Severní ledový oceán (Czech), Ishavet (Danish), Noordelijke IJszee (Dutch), Arctic Ocean (English), Arkta Oceano (Esperanto), Põhja-Jäämeri (Estonian), Océanu Glacial Árticu (Extremaduran), Arctic Ocean (Fiji Hindi), Pohjoinen jäämeri (Finnish), Ocèan artico (Franco-Provençal/Arpitan), Océan Arctique (French), Océano Ártico (Galician), 北冰洋 (Gan), ჩრდილოეთის ყინულოვანი ოკეანე (Georgian), Arktischer Ozean (German), Αρκτικός Ωκεανός (Greek), Paraguasu Árktiko (Guarani), Aktik (Haitian), Moana ʻĀlika (Hawaiian), אוקיינוס הקרח הצפוני (Hebrew), उत्तरध्रुवीय महासागर (Hindi), Jeges-tenger (Hungarian), Norður-Íshaf (Icelandic), Arktika oceano (Ido), Ébézí Élúụ̀wà (Igbo), Taaw Artiko (Ilokano), Samudra Arktik (Indonesian), Oceano Arctic (Interlingua), An tAigéan Artach (Irish), Mar Glaciale Artico (Italian), 北極海 (Japanese), Samudra Arktika (Javanese), ಆರ್ಕ್ಟಿಕ್ ಮಹಾಸಾಗರ (Kannada), Artiko Kadayatmalatan (Kapampangan), Шимал Бузлауукъ океан (Karachay-Balkar), Солтүстік Мұзды мұхит (Kazakh), មហាសមុទ្រអាកទិក (Khmer), Ойвыв Йыа океан (Komi-Permyak), 북극해 (Korean), Okyanûsa Arktîk (Kurdish), Oceanus Arcticus (Latin), Ziemeļu Ledus okeāns (Latvian), Кеферпатан МуркIарин океан (Lezgian), Arkties vandenynas (Lithuanian), artik.zei (Swedish), Karagatang Artiko (Tagalog), Уқёнуси яхбастаи шимолӣ (Tajik), ஆர்க்டிக் பெருங்கடல் (Tamil), Төньяк Боз океаны (Tatar), ఆర్క్‌టిక్ మహాసముద్రం (Telugu), มหาสมุทรอาร์กติก (Thai), Arktik Okyanusu (Turkish), Demirgazyk Buzly okean (Turkmen), Північний Льодовитий океан (Ukrainian), Sewjerny polarny ocean (Upper Sorbian), بحر منجمد شمالی (Urdu), Shimoliy Muz okeani (Uzbek), Mar Giazzal Artego (Venetian), Jävaldmeri (Vepsian), Bắc Băng Dương (Vietnamese), Oceyan Artike (Walloon), Kalawdan Artico (Waray), Cefnfor yr Arctig (Welsh), Noardlike Iissee (West Frisian), بحر منجمد شمالی (Western Panjabi), Mbàmbulaan gu Bëj-gànnaar (Wolof), ארקטישער אקעאן (Yiddish), Òkun Árktìkì (Yoruba), Okyanuso Arktik (Zazaki), Соңгу Доштуг океан (тыва дыл), بحر منجمد شمالی (Urdu)
Atlantic An tAigéan Atlantach (Irish), Atlandi ookean (Estonian), Atlánta (Northern Sami), Atlanten (Swedish), Atlanterhavet (Danish, Norwegian), Atlanteschen Ozean (Luxembourgish), Atlanti-óceán (Hungarian), Atlantic Ocean (English, Fiji Hindi, Northern Sotho, Scots), Atlántic Ocean (Interlingue), Atlantický oceán (Slovak), Atlantiese Oseaan (Afrikaans), Atlantijas okeāns (Latvian), Atlantik (Alemannic, Haitian, Low Saxon, Serbo-Croatian), Atlantik Kogoji (Bambara), Atlantik okean (Azerbaijani, Crimean Tatar, Turkmen), atlantik. zei braxamsi (Lojban), Atlantika Oceano (Esperanto), Atlantine valdmeri (Vepsian), Atlantisc Gārsecg (Anglo-Saxon), Atlantischa Ozean (Bavarian), Atlantische Oceaan (Dutch, Limburgish), Atlantische Oseåån (North Frisian), Atlantischen Oceaon (Zeelandic), Atlantischer Ozean (German), Atlantiske Ozean (Saterland Frisian), Atlantiski ocean (Lower and Upper Sorbian), Atlanto vandenynas (Lithuanian), Atlantshaf (Icelandic), Atlantshavið (Faroese), Atlantski ocean (Croatian, Slovenian), Atlantski okean (Bosnian), Atlantský oceán (Czech), Atlantycki Uocean (Silesian), Atlantyske Oseaan (West Frisian), Atlas Okyanusu (Turkish), Gungwa reAtlantic (Shona), Ilhuicaātl Atlántico (Nahuatl), Kadagatan Atlantiko (Central Bicolano), Kadagatang Atlantiko (Cebuano), Kalawdan Atlantico (Waray), Karagatang Atlantiko (Tagalog), Keynvor Atlantic (Friulian, Occitan, Romansh), Océan Atlàntich (Piedmontese), Ocèan Atlantico (Franco-Provençal/Arpitan), Oċean Atlantiku (Maltese), Océan Atlantique (French), Ocean Atlantycki (Polish), Oceano Atlanteco (Neapolitan), Oceano Atlantic (Interlingua), Oceano Atlantico (Italian), Oceano Atlântico (Portuguese), Océano Atlántico (Galician, Spanish), Oçeano Atlantico (Ligurian), Oceano мұхиты (Kazakh), Атлант океан (тыва дыл), Атлантик океан (Sakha, Tatar), Атлантик тептеҥыз (Meadow Mari), Атлантика океан (Komi-Permyak), Атлантика океанĕ (Chuvash), Атлантикань оцюведь (Moksha), (Armenian), አትላንቲክ ውቅያኖስ (Amharic), अटलांटिक महासागर (Marathi), अन्ध महासागर (Hindi), एटलान्टिक महासागर (Nepali), एट्लान्टिक महासागर (Newar / Nepal Bhasa), আটলান্টিক মহাসাগর (Bengali), আটলান্টিক মহাসাগৰ (Assamese), ਅੰਧ ਮਹਾਂਸਾਗਰ (Punjabi), அத்திலாந்திக்குப் பெருங்கடல் (Tamil), అట్లాంటిక్ మహాసముద్రం (Telugu), ಅಟ್ಲಾಂಟಿಕ್ ಮಹಾಸಾಗರ (Kannada), അറ്റ്‌ലാന്റിക് മഹാസമുദ്രം (Malayalam), අත්ලාන්තික් සාගරය (Sinhalese), มหาสมุทรแอตแลนติก (Thai), ནུབ་རྒྱ་མཚོ་ཆེན་པོ། (Tibetan), အတ္တလန္တိတ်သမုဒ္ဒရာ (Burmese), មហាសមុទ្រអាត្លង់ទិក (Khmer), 대서양 (Korean), 大西洋 (Chinese, Gan, Japanese, Wu), بحراوقیانوس (Urdu)
Indian La'ôt Hindia (Acehnese), Indiese Oseaan (Afrikaans), Oqeani Indian (Albanian), Indischer Ozean (Alemannic, German), ሕንድ ውቅያኖስ (Amharic), Indisc Gārsecg (Anglo-Saxon), Ocián Indico (Aragonese),
